plot outline: Thamizh Selvan, an orphan, tries to learn who his biological parents are. Durga, a reporter, helps Tamizh uncover the truth when he meets her at a nun's funeral service.
title: Dharma Seelan
plot: Thamizh Selvan, an orphan, tries to learn who his biological parents are. Durga, a reporter, helps Tamizh uncover the truth when he meets her at a nun's funeral service.
